title: Sudoku Game
subtitle: Coding Challenge & Interactive Game
description: This is a dynamic Sudoku game developed using React and TypeScript as part of the NavyBits Internship Challenge. It features a user-friendly interface, robust game logic with validation, a puzzle generator, and a manual solver. A .NET Core API using OpenCvSharp and TesseractOCR was explored for an image-based solver stretch goal, demonstrating backend and OCR integration. This API work is not included in the main repository due to ongoing accuracy refinements.

title: Jooler Factory
subtitle: E-commerce Platform
description: Jooler Factory is a website that sells handmade jewelry. The website is built with Angular. The backend is built with Python and Django. The database is MySQL Server. The website is hosted on Heroku.

title: Jooler ERP
subtitle: ERP System
description: Jooler ERP is a jewelry-focused ERP system designed to streamline inventory, order processing, and financial management. Built with Angular, TypeScript, SCSS, and Angular Material for a seamless UI, it leverages Django (Python) for the backend, MySQL for data management, and is hosted on Heroku. The platform enables efficient handling of custom orders, 3D models, invoices, and consignments, making jewelry business operations more intuitive and scalable.
